entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village where students can go for shopping and leisure. It is mentioned as a place where they can do Christmas shopping.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is excited about the Hogsmeade trip and suggests doing Christmas shopping there. She mentions her parents would love Toothﬁssing Stringmints from Honeydukes.

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: A shop in Hogsmeade where students can buy sweets and other treats. Hermione suggests buying Toothﬁssing Stringmints for her parents.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a teacher who lends Harry a copy of Which Broomstick. He is mentioned as someone who has knowledge about brooms.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is staying behind from the Hogsmeade trip. He is excited to read up on different makes of brooms and wants a new broom of his own.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is going on the Hogsmeade trip with Hermione.

entities.name: shooting star
entities.description: A broom that Harry has been riding at team practice. It is described as slow and jerky.

entities.name: griffindor tower
entities.description: The location where Harry heads back to after saying goodbye to Ron and Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry is going to visit Hogsmeade on the last weekend of the term.
Hermione suggests buying Toothﬁssing Stringmints from Honeydukes for her parents.
Wood lends Harry a copy of Which Broomstick.
Ron is going on the Hogsmeade trip with Hermione.
Harry has been riding a Shooting Star broom at team practice.
Griffindor Tower is the location where Harry heads back to after saying goodbye to Ron and Hermione.
